name: Zombie Survivor
description:
No#1 Zombie game of Cork CIty

Discover a whole new side of Cork City by surviving the onslaught of zombies.

Fast-paced and skilled for difficulty, these zombies will swarm you if your not fast enough to react in time to survive. Fun,easily attractive gameplay. Exciting game.

This release contains two levels of areas from Cork City. More levels, weapons and features will be coming soon along with better gameplay, graphics and sound.

Easier controls now with directions on screen buttons set together.

Listed in top 150 new releases in Google Play Store!!

Follow us on Twitter @BryanOSDev.
